whatido: I build things for the web.
miniDescription: I'm a software engineer based in Paris specializing in building (and occasionally designing) exceptional websites, applications, and everything in between.

description.p1: Hello ! I’m Amélie, a software engineer based in Paris.
description.p2: Passionate about everything related to web development and slightly manic, I attach great importance to developing clean and properly organized code.
description.p3: I enjoy creating things that live on the internet. My goal is to always build products that provide pixel-perfect, performant experiences.
description.p4: Here are a few technologies I've been working with recently :

contact: Interested in my work? I'm open to discuss ideas and professional opportunities. Drop me a direct email.

services1.name: Web projects
services1.detail: Showcase website, corporate, events, blog, e-commerce, portfolio.

services2.name: Graphic design
services2.detail: Web templates, newsletters, emailings, business cards, advertising brochure ..

services4.name: Responsive web design
services4.detail: Compatible with all devices: mobiles, tablets, laptops and desktop.
